summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a business checking account at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period from June 1, 2016, to June 30, 2016. It details deposits, withdrawals, and fees associated with the account, highlighting the financial activities during this timeframe.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for ISC Interiors LLC from June 1, 2016, to June 30, 2016.
The beginning balance on June 1, 2016, was $20,681.69.
The ending balance on June 30, 2016, was $8,016.96.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made during the month, including payroll fees and tax payments.
The document includes contact information for inquiries regarding account transactions.
